0.1.name: wordpress/decategorizer
0.1.description:
THIS PLUGIN IS NOW OBSOLETE,PLEASE SWITCH TO 'WP NO CATEGORY BASE' PLUGIN

Go to http://skyphe.org/code/wordpress/decategorizer/ for the explanation, thanks!

"Decategorizer" will remove the category base from your category links, and turn your category URLs from something like "http://yourdomain/category/news/" to "http://yourdomain/news/".

Features:

301 redirection for old category links added automatically;
works with most permalink structures (please e-mail me or leave a comment on plugin's site if it doesn't work for you); you can safely use variables in your category URLs (http://yourdomain/news/?var=val); sitemap plugins compatible; it works with multiple subcategory links (
